lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers took turns guarding Kobe Bryant, everybody wanting one last shot at the legend. When the buzzer finally sounded, they gathered for one last chance to shake their longtime rival's hand.

headline.print_headline: Clippers Beat Lakers 91-81 in Kobe's Next-To-Last Home Game
headline.main: Clippers Beat Lakers 91-81 in Kobe's Next-To-Last Home Game
